name: The Witness
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is being shaped by observation, memory, and the need to name what is true.
shadow: Witnessing becomes distance when one watches carefully but refuses involvement entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward speaking with precision from what has been seen.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests observing longer before taking a position.

name: The Bearer
core: The personal lens suggests the question is being carried as a burden of care, duty, or endurance.
shadow: Burden becomes identity when no weight is ever set down long enough to be examined.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates responsibility can still be carried with deliberate agency.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reducing the load before deciding what must remain.

name: The Wayfarer
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is shaped by movement, departure, and a willingness to learn by travel rather than permanence.
shadow: Motion becomes avoidance when leaving is chosen simply to escape the labor of staying.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a meaningful step into new ground.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests understanding what is being left before crossing the threshold.

name: The Keeper
core: The personal lens suggests preservation, stewardship, and careful custody are central to the question.
shadow: Preservation becomes stagnation when holding replaces judgment about what still deserves to remain.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates what is valuable can be protected without halting all motion.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests checking whether the guarded thing is still alive beneath its shelter.

name: The Speaker
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is shaped by naming, persuasion, and the consequences of choosing words publicly.
shadow: Speech becomes manipulation when language is used to steer rather than clarify.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward speaking directly and with proportion.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests saying less until the necessary sentence becomes clear.

name: The Listener
core: The personal lens suggests understanding depends on what can be heard beneath the obvious statement.
shadow: Listening becomes passivity when attention replaces every form of response.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates careful hearing can guide a cleaner answer.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests allowing the silence to lengthen before deciding what it means.

name: The Vigilant
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is being held under watch, caution, and a reluctance to be surprised.
shadow: Caution becomes suspicion when every movement is read as a threat.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using watchfulness to secure a wise action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests relaxing the guard enough to see what is no longer dangerous.

name: The Artisan
core: The personal lens suggests the question is being shaped through craft, revision, and deliberate making.
shadow: Craft becomes perfectionism when refinement is used to delay completion.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward forming the answer through skilled labor.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests strengthening the design before expanding its scope.

name: The Penitent
core: The personal lens suggests remorse, accountability, and the desire to set something right are guiding the reading.
shadow: Contrition becomes self-punishment when repair is replaced by endless inward judgment.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward making amends in a concrete and proportional way.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests distinguishing responsibility from self-erasure.

name: The Healer
core: The personal lens suggests repair, mercy, and restoration are central to how the question is being understood.
shadow: Healing becomes denial when recovery is declared before the wound is known.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward active and practical restoration.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests tending the injury before pursuing larger progress.

name: The Judge
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is being weighed through standards, evidence, and consequence.
shadow: Judgment becomes severity when complexity is compressed into a verdict too early.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward a careful decision grounded in what can be defended.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests delaying the sentence until the evidence is fully assembled.

name: The Exile
core: The personal lens suggests estrangement, distance, or self-removal is shaping how the question is interpreted.
shadow: Distance becomes identity when exile is treated as the only honest form of living.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward returning in part, even if not fully.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests honoring the distance while testing whether it still serves a need.

name: The Guardian
core: The personal lens suggests defense, loyalty, and concern for the vulnerable are shaping the reading.
shadow: Protection becomes control when safeguarding another removes their agency entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward guarding what matters without closing every gate.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests verifying whether the danger is current or merely remembered.

name: The Pilgrim
core: The personal lens suggests meaning is being sought through ordeal, distance, or sacred persistence.
shadow: Purpose becomes self-abandonment when the road is followed after its lesson has already been learned.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward continuing the journey with clearer intention.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests resting long enough to ask what the road has already given.

name: The Orphan
core: The personal lens suggests abandonment, discontinuity, or unsupported responsibility is central to the feeling of the question.
shadow: Self-reliance becomes desolation when the refusal to need anyone is treated as strength alone.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward building chosen bonds where inherited ones failed.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests naming the loneliness without letting it define the future.

name: The Mourner
core: The personal lens suggests grief, remembrance, and unresolved tenderness are shaping the reading.
shadow: Grief becomes enclosure when sorrow is treated as the last true bond to what was lost.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward carrying the loss without surrendering the living present.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests remaining with the grief long enough for its instruction to emerge.

name: The Aspirant
core: The personal lens suggests ambition, growth, and a reaching beyond present station are active within the question.
shadow: Aspiration becomes hunger when advancement is pursued without regard for cost or meaning.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward disciplined effort aimed at worthy elevation.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests clarifying the aim before climbing further.

name: The Heritor
core: The personal lens suggests the question is bound to inheritance, legacy, and what has been received rather than chosen.
shadow: Inheritance becomes imprisonment when legacy is obeyed after its purpose has died.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using what was inherited without being ruled by it.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests examining what should be carried forward and what should end here.

name: The Strategist
core: The personal lens suggests the matter is being viewed through preparation, sequencing, and the management of consequence.
shadow: Planning becomes distortion when control is pursued at the expense of responsiveness.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward arranging the field before making the move.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests leaving room for the unexpected rather than planning it out of existence.

name: The Supplicant
core: The personal lens suggests dependence, petition, and the need for aid are shaping how the matter is approached.
shadow: Need becomes self-erasure when all agency is handed away with the request.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward asking clearly for what is needed without surrendering dignity.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests determining which help is truly necessary before seeking it.

name: The Votary
core: The personal lens suggests devotion, chosen discipline, and a willing offering of effort are central to the question.
shadow: Devotion becomes fanaticism when reverence is used to excuse imbalance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward committing cleanly to what has already proven worthy.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests testing whether the vow still serves truth rather than only habit.

name: The Mask
core: The personal lens suggests role, persona, and performed identity are active parts of the matter being interpreted.
shadow: Presentation becomes concealment when the role is maintained after the self beneath it has changed.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward choosing the role deliberately rather than unconsciously.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests asking what the mask protects and what it prevents.

name: The Anchorite
core: The personal lens suggests withdrawal, discipline, and chosen solitude are shaping the reading.
shadow: Solitude becomes severance when retreat is used to refuse all answering relation.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward drawing strength from solitude without letting it become exile.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests remaining inward only as long as the inward work remains honest.

name: The Reconciler
core: The personal lens suggests repair, mediation, and the search for liveable accord are central to the question.
shadow: Peace becomes evasion when reconciliation is pursued without truth or accountability.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward bringing opposing claims into one workable field.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests not forcing peace faster than honesty can support it.

name: The Remnant
core: The personal lens suggests survival after loss, partial inheritance, and the task of continuing with what remains.
shadow: Survival becomes diminishment when the remnant is treated as all that can ever be.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward building from what endured without denying what was lost.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests honoring the fragment before demanding fullness from it.
